Package am.aua.StrategyGame.core

package am.aua.StrategyGame.core
  • Class
    Description
    Archer
    Represents an Archer unit in the game.
    BattleResult
    Helper class for resolving battles between two countries.
    Country
    Represents a country in the strategy game.
    Game
    Core Game controller that manages two countries and handles game logic such as saving, battles, and gold cycles.
    GameSaver
    Utility class for saving and loading the game state to and from a file.
    Horseman
    Represents a Horseman unit in the game.
    InvalidActionException
    Custom exception used to indicate that a player's action is not allowed, such as trying to buy a troop without enough gold.
    Knight
    Represents a Knight unit in the game.
    Troop
    Abstract class for all troop types in the game.
    Upgrade
    Represents an economic upgrade system for a country.
